chapterinfo.title: NATO Interoperabiltiy Standards and Profiles
chapterinfo.subtitle: A NEW "OPEN SYSTEMS" APPROACH FOR NATO
chapterinfo.corpauthor: C3B Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT)

section.title: Welcome to NISP
section.para: This version contains the NISP Volumes 1 - 4 in both html and pdf formats.

This draft document is being developed by the Interoperability Profiles Capability Team (IP CaT) under the authority of the NATO Consultation, Command and Control Board (C3B). It will be noted by the C3 Board (REF TBD) making the Volume 2 standards and volume 3 profiles mandatory for use in NATO common funded systems, and made available to the general public as a replacement for ADatP-34(G) when approved by the C3B.
